Dayda

City of New York

This is a catalog of datasets organized and made more accessible from the City of New York, providing simple dowloadable CSV and JSON files, as well as Postman Collections you can use as part of workflows and other automation.

About

    NYC Covered Building's List (2014)

    NYC Citywide Annualized Calendar Sales Update

    Annualized sales file displays yearly sales information of properties sold in New York City.

    NYC City Hall Library Catalog

    The City Hall Library is New York City’s official depository for all agency published reports and studies. More info can be found at http://nyc.gov/html/records/html/about/chlibrary.shtml
